mapper.select: SELECT TVM.ID_VOC , TVM.BIZ_CHNN , CHNN.CODE_NAME AS NM_CHNN , TVM.ID_BIZ_KEY , TVM.ORDER_NO , TVM.ID_STORE , MST.STOR_NM AS NM_STORE , TVM.FG_MEMBER , TVM.ID_MEMBER , TVM.NM_CUST , TVM.NO_PHONE , TVM.DS_EMAIL , TVM.YN_PRIVACY_AGREE , TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_AGREE , TVM.YN_PRIVACY_ORDER_AGREE , TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_ORDER_AGREE , TVM.CD_VOC_STATUS , STAT.CODE_NAME AS NM_VOC_STATUS , TVM.CD_ACT_CAUSE , TVM.DS_ACT_CONT , TO_CHAR(NVL(TVM.DT_VOC_ACT,SYSDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_VOC_ACT , TVM.ID_ACT_EMP , NVL(USER_ACT.USER_NM, '콜센터' ) AS NM_ACT_EMP , TVM.ID_ACT_DEPT , SUBSTR(TVM.CD_VOC_CAUSE,0,2) AS CD_VOC_CAUSE_1 , TVM.CD_VOC_CAUSE AS CD_VOC_CAUSE_2 , TVM.DS_TITLE , TVM.DS_CONT , TVM.DS_DISPATCH_CONT , TVM.FG_DEL , TO_CHAR(TVM.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_REG , TVM.ID_REG_USER , TO_CHAR(TVM.DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT , TVM.ID_UPT_USER , TO_CHAR(TVM.DT_VOC_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_VOC_REG , TVM.PAYMENT_TYPE , PAYTP.CODE_NAME AS NM_PAYMENT_TYPE , TVM.PAYMENT_PRC , TO_CHAR(TVM.DT_ORDER, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_ORDER , TVM.MENU_NM , OMN.MENU_CD , TVM.FG_SEND FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_MASTER TVM LEFT outer join (SELECT ORDER_NO, SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(A ,',', MENU_NM) ORDER BY ORDER_NO).EXTRACT('//text()').GETSTRINGVAL() , 2) AS MENU_NM, SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(A ,',', MENU_CD) ORDER BY ORDER_NO).EXTRACT('//text()').GETSTRINGVAL() , 2) AS MENU_CD FROM OMNI.OMNI_ORDER_MENU GROUP BY ORDER_NO) OMN ON OMN.ORDER_NO = TVM.ORDER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_USER USER_ACT ON USER_ACT.USER_ID = TVM.ID_ACT_EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_USER USER_NOW ON USER_NOW.USER_ID = #{user.id} LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CHNN ON CHNN.CODE = TVM.BIZ_CHNN AND CHNN.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_BIZ_CHNN' LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_STOR_APP MST ON MST.STOR_CD = TVM.ID_STORE AND MST.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MST.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MST.STOR_STATUS = '1' AND SUBSTR(MST.STOR_CD, 4, 1) != '9' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= MST.SALES_START_DATE LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE STAT ON STAT.CODE = TVM.CD_VOC_STATUS AND STAT.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_VOC_STATUS' LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE PAYTP ON PAYTP.CODE = TVM.PAYMENT_TYPE AND PAYTP.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'PAYMENT_TYPE' WHERE TVM.ID_VOC = #{ID_VOC}
SELECT ID_VOC , FILE_NM , FILE_KEY FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_ATTACH WHERE ID_VOC = #{ID_VOC}

SELECT OM.ORDER_CHN , CHN.CODE_NAME AS NM_ORDER_CHN , OM.ID_MEMBER , TM.CD_STATUS , OM.STOR_CD , MS.STOR_NM , TO_CHAR(OM.REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_ORDER , OM.PAYMENT_TYPE , PAYTP.CODE_NAME AS NM_PAYMENT_TYPE , OMN.MENU_CD , OM.ORDER_NM , OM.PAYMENT_PRC , CASE WHEN TM.NM_MEMBER IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS YN_MEMBER , NVL(TM.NM_MEMBER, OM.ORDER_MEMBER_NM) AS NM_MEMBER , NVL(TM.NO_PHONE, ORDER_TELNO) AS NO_PHONE , TM.DS_EMAIL , TVM.YN_PRIVACY_AGREE /*개인정보수집동의여부*/ , TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_AGREE /*민감정보수집동의여부*/ , TVM.YN_PRIVACY_ORDER_AGREE /*개인정보제3자제공동의여부*/ , TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_ORDER_AGREE /*민감정보제3자제공동의여부*/ , OM.POS_ORDER_NO , OM.CALL_ORDER_NO FROM OMNI.OMNI_ORDER_MAIN OM LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_STOR_APP MS ON OM.STOR_CD = MS.STOR_CD AND MS.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MS.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MS.STOR_STATUS = '1' AND SUBSTR(MS.STOR_CD, 4, 1) != '9' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= MS.SALES_START_DATE LEFT outer join (SELECT ORDER_NO, SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(A ,',', MENU_NM) ORDER BY ORDER_NO).EXTRACT('//text()').GETSTRINGVAL() , 2) AS MENU_NM, SUBSTR( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT(A ,',', MENU_CD) ORDER BY ORDER_NO).EXTRACT('//text()').GETSTRINGVAL() , 2) AS MENU_CD FROM OMNI.OMNI_ORDER_MENU GROUP BY ORDER_NO) OMN ON OMN.ORDER_NO = OM.ORDER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER TM ON OM.ID_MEMBER = TM.ID_MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_MASTER TVM ON OM.ORDER_NO = TVM.ORDER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CHN ON CHN.CODE = OM.ORDER_CHN AND CHN.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_BIZ_CHNN' LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE PAYTP ON PAYTP.CODE = OM.PAYMENT_TYPE AND PAYTP.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'PAYMENT_TYPE' WHERE OM.ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}

SELECT CAUSE1.CODE AS CD_CAUSE1 ,CAUSE2.CODE AS CD_CAUSE2 ,CAUSE2.CODE_NAME AS CAUSE2 ,CAUSE1.CODE_NAME AS CAUSE1 FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CAUSE1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CAUSE2 ON CAUSE1.CODE = CAUSE2.PARENT_CODE AND CAUSE2.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_VOC_CAUSE_2' WHERE CAUSE1.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_VOC_CAUSE_1' AND CAUSE2.CODE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{NM_CAUSE}||'%'

SELECT STOR_CD , STOR_NM FROM OMNI.OMNI_STOR_APP MST WHERE STOR_NM LIKE #{STOR_NM}||'%' AND MST.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MST.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MST.STOR_STATUS = '1' AND SUBSTR(MST.STOR_CD, 4, 1) != 9 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= MST.SALES_START_DATE
SELECT USER_ID , USER_NM FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_USER WHERE USER_NM LIKE #{NM_USER_SEARCH}||'%'
